Clan Level-UpLevel-Up your clan!

If you want to level-up your clan, you will need some Custom Coins per level.
Level 1 to 5: Free Level 5 to 6: 10 Custom Coins Level 6 to 7: 15 Custom Coins Level 7 to 8: 20 Custom Coins Level 8 to 9: 30 Custom Coins Level 9 to 10: 40 Custom Coins Level 10 to 11: 50 Custom Coins
